sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_eb0360204797d550bb9f49de536d4312
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ReleasePlanningHelper</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>ReleasePlanningHelper</name><script><![CDATA[var ReleasePlanningHelper = Class.create();
ReleasePlanningHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this.queryId = "364a3780-6940-47a3-90e4-e4c09bb89cb2";
    },

	getScheduledStories: function (queryId) {
        var url = "https://dev.azure.com/hagerty/Hagerty/_apis/wit/wiql/" + queryId + "?api-version=6.0";
        var method = "GET";
        var basicAuthCredsId = "e8f4215ddbb4505064f2263705961944";
        var authGr = new GlideRecord("basic_auth_credentials");
        authGr.get(basicAuthCredsId);
        var username = authGr.getValue("user_name");
        var password = new GlideEncrypter().decrypt(authGr.getValue("password"));
        // gs.info(username);
        // gs.info(password);

        var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        rm.setHttpMethod(method);
        rm.setBasicAuth(username, password);
        rm.setEndpoint(url);
        rm.setLogLevel("all");
        var res = rm.execute();
        // gs.info(JSON.stringify({
        //     "body": res.getBody(),
        //     "status": res.getStatusCode(),
        //     "error_code": res.getErrorCode(),
        //     "error_message": res.getErrorMessage()
        // }));
        return JSON.parse(res.getBody());
    },

    // buildReleasePlanningQueryString: function (resBody) {
    //     var queryStr = "";
    //     resBody.workItems.forEach(function(item){
            
    //         if (queryStr != "") {
    //             queryStr += "^OR";
    //         }

    //         queryStr += "nameLIKE" + item.id;

    //     });
    //     return queryStr;
    // },

    buildReleasePlanningQueryString: function (resBody) {
        var queryStr = "";

        for (var i = 0; i < resBody.workItems.length; i++) {
            var item = resBody.workItems[i];
            var id = item.id + "";
            var ids = this.getSysIdsForContainsQuery(id);

            if (queryStr != "") {
                queryStr += ","
            }

            queryStr += ids;
        }

        return queryStr;
    },

    getSysIdsForContainsQuery: function (adoId) {
        var usgr = new GlideRecord("sys_update_set");
        usgr.addEncodedQuery("nameLIKE" + adoId);
        usgr.query();
        var idStr = "";
        
        while (usgr.next()) {

            if (idStr != "") {

                idStr += ",";

            }

            idStr += usgr.sys_id + '';
        }

        return idStr;
    },

    buildReleasePlanningRedirectUrl: function () {
        var queryId = this.queryId;
        var resBody = JSON.parse(this.getScheduledStories(queryId));
        var queryStr = this.buildReleasePlanningQueryString(resBody);
        return "/sys_update_set_list.do?sysparm_query=" + queryStr;
    },
	

//     javascript:new ReleasePlanningHelper()._filterBuilder();
    _filterBuilder: function () {
        return this.buildReleasePlanningQueryString(this.getScheduledStories(this.queryId));
    },


    type: 'ReleasePlanningHelper'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>talberty</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-17 21:08:59</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>eb0360204797d550bb9f49de536d4312</sys_id><sys_mod_count>40</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ReleasePlanningHelper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_eb0360204797d550bb9f49de536d4312</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>talberty</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-28 20:40:55</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.generateReleasePlanningUrl</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>generateReleasePlanningUrl</name><script><![CDATA[function generateReleasePlanningUrl() {
	var res = new global.ReleasePlanningHelper()._filterBuilder();
	gs.info(res);
	return res;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>talberty</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-18 20:05:41</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>bcfd19f8471b5950bb9f49de536d43fd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>generateReleasePlanningUrl</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_bcfd19f8471b5950bb9f49de536d43fd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>talberty</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-28 19:21:51</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.generateReleasePlanningUrl</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>on demand script include. Generate comma seperated list of sys_ids for update sets that contain ADO IDs of ADO work items showing in the "Scheduled for release" query. Used in dynamic filter on the update set table.</description><name>generateReleasePlanningUrl</name><script><![CDATA[function generateReleasePlanningUrl(credsId) {
	var res = new global.ReleasePlanningHelper(credsId)._filterBuilder();
	//gs.info("release planning helper troubleshooting: " + res);
	return res;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>talberty</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-18 20:05:41</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>bcfd19f8471b5950bb9f49de536d43fd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>9</sys_mod_count><sys_name>generateReleasePlanningUrl</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_bcfd19f8471b5950bb9f49de536d43fd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>talberty</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-12-05 15:39:41</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ReleasePlanningHelper</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>ReleasePlanningHelper</name><script><![CDATA[var ReleasePlanningHelper = Class.create();
ReleasePlanningHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
        this.queryId = "364a3780-6940-47a3-90e4-e4c09bb89cb2";
    },

	getScheduledStories: function (queryId) {
        var url = "https://dev.azure.com/hagerty/Hagerty/_apis/wit/wiql/" + queryId + "?api-version=6.0";
        var method = "GET";
        var basicAuthCredsId = gs.getProperty("releasePlanning.credentialsId");
        var authGr = new GlideRecord("basic_auth_credentials");
        authGr.get(basicAuthCredsId);
        var username = authGr.getValue("user_name");
        var password = new GlideEncrypter().decrypt(authGr.getValue("password"));
        // gs.info(username);
        // gs.info(password);

        var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        rm.setHttpMethod(method);
        rm.setBasicAuth(username, password);
        rm.setEndpoint(url);
        rm.setLogLevel("all");
        var res = rm.execute();
        // gs.info(JSON.stringify({
        //     "body": res.getBody(),
        //     "status": res.getStatusCode(),
        //     "error_code": res.getErrorCode(),
        //     "error_message": res.getErrorMessage()
        // }));
        return JSON.parse(res.getBody());
    },

    // buildReleasePlanningQueryString: function (resBody) {
    //     var queryStr = "";
    //     resBody.workItems.forEach(function(item){
            
    //         if (queryStr != "") {
    //             queryStr += "^OR";
    //         }

    //         queryStr += "nameLIKE" + item.id;

    //     });
    //     return queryStr;
    // },

    buildReleasePlanningQueryString: function (resBody) {
        var queryStr = "";

        for (var i = 0; i < resBody.workItems.length; i++) {
            var item = resBody.workItems[i];
            var id = item.id + "";
            var ids = this.getSysIdsForContainsQuery(id);

            if (queryStr != "") {
                queryStr += ","
            }

            queryStr += ids;
        }

        return queryStr;
    },

    getSysIdsForContainsQuery: function (adoId) {
        var usgr = new GlideRecord("sys_update_set");
        usgr.addEncodedQuery("nameLIKE" + adoId);
        usgr.query();
        var idStr = "";
        
        while (usgr.next()) {

            if (idStr != "") {

                idStr += ",";

            }

            idStr += usgr.sys_id + '';
        }

        return idStr;
    },

    buildReleasePlanningRedirectUrl: function () {
        var queryId = this.queryId;
        var resBody = JSON.parse(this.getScheduledStories(queryId));
        var queryStr = this.buildReleasePlanningQueryString(resBody);
        return "/sys_update_set_list.do?sysparm_query=" + queryStr;
    },
	

//     javascript:new ReleasePlanningHelper()._filterBuilder();
    _filterBuilder: function () {
        return this.buildReleasePlanningQueryString(this.getScheduledStories(this.queryId));
    },


    type: 'ReleasePlanningHelper'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>talberty</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-17 21:08:59</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>eb0360204797d550bb9f49de536d4312</sys_id><sys_mod_count>41</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ReleasePlanningHelper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_eb0360204797d550bb9f49de536d4312</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>talberty</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-28 21:04:57</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_properties"><sys_properties action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><choices/><description>sys_id of credentials record to use for ReleasePlanningHelper script include.</description><ignore_cache>true</ignore_cache><is_private>false</is_private><name>releasePlanning.credentialsId</name><read_roles>admin</read_roles><suffix/><sys_class_name>sys_properties</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>talberty</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-28 21:03:47</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>274b89c4a7e31d9064f20b7fb05a57a9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>releasePlanning.credentialsId</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_properties_274b89c4a7e31d9064f20b7fb05a57a9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>talberty</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-28 21:04:39</sys_updated_on><type>string</type><value>e8f4215ddbb4505064f2263705961944</value><write_roles>admin</write_roles></sys_properties><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=274b89c4a7e31d9064f20b7fb05a57a9"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_eb0360204797d550bb9f49de536d4312
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.ReleasePlanningHelper</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>ReleasePlanningHelper</name><script><![CDATA[var ReleasePlanningHelper = Class.create();
ReleasePlanningHelper.prototype = {
    initialize: function(credsId) {
        this.queryId = "364a3780-6940-47a3-90e4-e4c09bb89cb2";
		this.credsId = credsId;
    },

	getScheduledStories: function (queryId) {
        var url = "https://dev.azure.com/hagerty/Hagerty/_apis/wit/wiql/" + queryId + "?api-version=6.0";
        var method = "GET";
		
		if (gs.nil(this.credsId)) {
			this.credsId = gs.getProperty("releasePlanning.credentialsId");

		}
		
        var authGr = new GlideRecord("basic_auth_credentials");
        authGr.get(this.credsId);
        var username = authGr.getValue("user_name");
        var password = new GlideEncrypter().decrypt(authGr.getValue("password"));
        // gs.info(username);
        // gs.info(password);

        var rm = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
        rm.setHttpMethod(method);
        rm.setBasicAuth(username, password);
        rm.setEndpoint(url);
        rm.setLogLevel("all");
        var res = rm.execute();
        gs.info(JSON.stringify({
            "body": res.getBody(),
            "status": res.getStatusCode(),
            "error_code": res.getErrorCode(),
            "error_message": res.getErrorMessage()
        }));
        return JSON.parse(res.getBody());
    },

    // buildReleasePlanningQueryString: function (resBody) {
    //     var queryStr = "";
    //     resBody.workItems.forEach(function(item){
            
    //         if (queryStr != "") {
    //             queryStr += "^OR";
    //         }

    //         queryStr += "nameLIKE" + item.id;

    //     });
    //     return queryStr;
    // },

    buildReleasePlanningQueryString: function (resBody) {
        var queryStr = "";

        for (var i = 0; i < resBody.workItems.length; i++) {
            var item = resBody.workItems[i];
            var id = item.id + "";
            var ids = this.getSysIdsForContainsQuery(id);

            if (queryStr != "") {
                queryStr += ","
            }

            queryStr += ids;
        }

        return queryStr;
    },

    getSysIdsForContainsQuery: function (adoId) {
        var usgr = new GlideRecord("sys_update_set");
        usgr.addEncodedQuery("nameLIKE" + adoId);
        usgr.query();
        var idStr = "";
        
        while (usgr.next()) {

            if (idStr != "") {

                idStr += ",";

            }

            idStr += usgr.sys_id + '';
        }

        return idStr;
    },

    buildReleasePlanningRedirectUrl: function () {
        var queryId = this.queryId;
        var resBody = JSON.parse(this.getScheduledStories(queryId));
        var queryStr = this.buildReleasePlanningQueryString(resBody);
        return "/sys_update_set_list.do?sysparm_query=" + queryStr;
    },
	

//     javascript:new ReleasePlanningHelper()._filterBuilder();
    _filterBuilder: function () {
        return this.buildReleasePlanningQueryString(this.getScheduledStories(this.queryId));
    },


    type: 'ReleasePlanningHelper'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>talberty</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-11-17 21:08:59</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>eb0360204797d550bb9f49de536d4312</sys_id><sys_mod_count>45</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ReleasePlanningHelper</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_eb0360204797d550bb9f49de536d4312</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>talberty</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-11-28 21:21:12</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
